name: swl-site-dev

scripts.build: node scripts/verifyEnv.mjs && node scripts/checkChannelInsert.mjs && node scripts/verifySupabaseContext.mjs && next build

description: Internal-only Next.js 15 dashboard that powers staff access to scheduling, menu building, inventory tracking, and Cortex reflections for [Snow White Laundry](https://ai.snowwhitelaundry.co). The app ships with the dark neon-blue visual language that mirrors the guest site and is designed to deploy to its own Vercel project `swl-site-staff`.
